abstract: David S. Taylor, a group president who joined P.&G. in 1980, takes charge of a company that has spent months vigorously slimming down.
snippet: David S. Taylor, a group president who joined P.&G. in 1980, takes charge of a company that has spent months vigorously slimming down.
lead_paragraph: Procter & Gamble has named David S. Taylor, its group president of global beauty, grooming and health care, as its next chief executive, a move that comes on the heels of a major corporate restructuring that the company hopes will help improve its sputtering growth.

headline.main: A Smaller P.&G. Sets Its Next Leader
headline.print_headline: A Smaller P.&G. Sets Its Next Leader
